title: Me: "I have a 9-hour shift today, can I take my break around 12-1?"
body:
My boss: "We'll see." *(Meanwhile I have to cover her ass while she takes 3 smoke breaks an hour but she won't cover for me so I can sustain myself and not kill myself with cigs)*

Looks like I'm not getting a lunch break today! :'D

So how is your day so far, friends? Lovely? Horrible? Soft-serve?
